title: Paul's Travail: A Reintroduction to Galatians (Pactum Novum Commentaries)
features: In this fresh look at a beloved book, Tim Gallant develops a reading of Galatians that follows the unified thread of Paul's chain of argument. Showing sensitivity both to the coherence of Scripture and to the freshness of the apocalyptic new creation brought about by Jesus the Messiah, Paul's Travail weaves rigorous exegetical work, a strong sense of biblical theology and typology, and experienced pastoral sense into one harmonious whole.
description: Tim Gallant received his M.Div. from Mid-America Reformed Seminary, graduating with honours in 2000. He has served over a decade in various pastoral roles, and is author of several books, including Feed My Lambs and These Are Two Covenants.
